IS590DV - Data Visualization

This is the course website for IS590 Data Visualization in Spring 2019

  • View On GitHub

Week 2 - Data Storage and Operations

For this week’s code-along demo, if you haven’t already done so, please be sure to install Anaconda. Please also download this dataset:

  • pokemon.csv
  • IL_Building_Inventory.csv

This week we discussed how data is stored on disk and in memory, how that interacts with our visualization process, and we introduced the notion of a palette of operations you can apply to data to visualize it.
